Description.Text: Rixos Borovoe Hotel is a contemporary 5-star property offering elegant accommodation in south Borovoe. Highlights include a luxury spa, fine dining restaurants and an excellent location overlooking Lake Schuchye. Schuchinsk is a northern city situated next to Lake Schuchye and bordering the Borovoe National Parking. It sits in an area of stunning natural beauty with picturesque mountains, grand lakes and dense pine woods. Regional places of interest include Cash Ville Casino, the village of Borovoe and the Okzhetpes Mountain. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Borovoe destinations. The hotel occupies a contemporary building featuring a unique Y-shaped design. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, a state-of-the-art gym, steam bath, saunas, Jacuzzi, VIP areas and spa treatment rooms. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Deluxe Lake View rooms are 34sqm and decorated in a contemporary style. They overlook Lake Schuchye. Amenities include a 32-inch flat-screen TV, safe, tea and coffee equipment and air-conditioning. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub and underfloor heating.
